definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Polio eradication is one of our most important areas of unfinished business.
sentences.chinese: 根除脊髓灰質炎是我們未完成工作的最重要領域之一。

sentences.english: Local rulers were too weak to extirpate them.
sentences.chinese: 當地的統治者力量太弱，無法根除他們。

sentences.english: The vice-adviser advised the reviser to devise adevice for getting rid of vice.
sentences.chinese: 代辦顧問發起校訂者想出一個根除敗行的計謀。

sentences.english: Want to Eradicate Injustice? Go Ahead - The Forward Mail To Everyone You Know …!
sentences.chinese: 你想要根除這些偏見和不公嗎？

sentences.english: Does Helicobacter pylori eradication therapy for peptic ulcer prevent gastric cancer?
sentences.chinese: 幽門螺桿菌根除治療消化性潰瘍是否能預防胃癌？

sentences.english: Recently the government has been stepping up efforts to eradicate such abuses.
sentences.chinese: 近來，中國政府正着力根除這些濫用短信的行爲。

sentences.english: All five are working to stop the disease.
sentences.chinese: 所有這五個國家都還正爲根除這一疾病努力着。

sentences.english: The campaign to eradicate malaria did not.
sentences.chinese: 而根除瘧疾運動則未做到這一點。

sentences.english: You should try to eliminate trans fats completely from your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你應當儘量從你的飲食中根除反式脂肪。

sentences.english: An attempt was made to eradicate, but the pope reversed himself.
sentences.chinese: 只是試圖根除，但教皇反悔了他的話。

sentences.english: Why is it so important to end polio?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼根除小兒麻痹症如此重要？

sentences.english: This practice also eliminates illnesses and purifies disturbances by evil spirits .
sentences.chinese: 斷行法也能根除疾病，斷除外界邪魔的干擾。

sentences.english: They aimed at the cure of bureaucratism.
sentences.chinese: 他們的目的在於根除官僚主義。

sentences.english: This is a key reason why rampant corruption in the country cannot be eradicated.
sentences.chinese: 這就是菲律賓貪污問題難以根除的主要原因之一。

sentences.english: We have already eradicated one of the three strains of wild polio virus.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經根除了三種野生脊灰病毒菌株之一。

sentences.english: Only eradication will guarantee that all children are safe.
sentences.chinese: 只有根除才能保證所有的孩子安全。

definition: to bring under permanent control/to effect a radical cure
to treat the symptoms but not the root cause
to treat only the symptoms but not the root cause
to root out/to eliminate the roots/to cure once and for all
to take radical measures/to get to the root (of a problem etc)
to get sth done once and for all
to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
stubborn illness/disease that is difficult to treat
